Articles.Content:
Hi! I've been looking for good wheel mods for a while but couldn't find anything.

I got the carts mod, but that's just premade rovers. I don't want those. I want to build my own rover, just with usefull wheels.

DA DA DA DUN!

The perfect mod!

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/8211-Plugin-Parts-14-3-Katerpillar-Wheels-V0-3?highlight=wheel

I've heard about this sorta thing pretty often, and Katapillar mod is always the suggestion. Thing is, they are pretty slow, and don't handle the same. I know what OP is looking for - I keep finding myself wanting the same thing!

So I've actually started this myself - http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/21792-Torpedo-s-Modular-Multiwheels!

If anyone has suggestions how they want it to look, go ahead and make them while I'm still making the mod.
If I'm honest, I haven't used the mod, just saw it one day and bookmarked it.

Hi! I've been looking for good wheel mods for a while but couldn't find anything.

I got the carts mod, but that's just premade rovers. I don't want those. I want to build my own rover, just with usefull wheels.

Now released what is just the mod you are looking for I think :

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/21909-0-16-TouhouTorpedo-s-Modular-Multiwheels-%28Tosh-s-Cart-Mod-powered%29?p=278415#post278415
